attributes.action: Stop discussing unimportant trivia when the country has real problems to deal with
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You stand up in Parliament and discuss Big Brother because the word 'racism' is wheeled out yet again without any supporting evidence.  How about concentrating on the war(s), the economy, the NHS, the transport meltdown, the pension crisis, global warming........

When questions of a trivial nature are raised, do not allow yourself to be drawn; it lowers your office.
